H0.text: Whose 23rd. piano sonata is known as the 'Apassionata'. Franz Liszt

H1.text: Whose 23rd. piano sonata is known as the 'Apassionata'. Frédéric Chopin

H2.text: Whose 23rd. piano sonata is known as the 'Apassionata'. Robert Schumann

H3.text: Whose 23rd. piano sonata is known as the 'Apassionata'. Betoven

A4.text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 23 in F minor, Op. 57 is colloquially known as the Appassionata.

A5.text: Beethoven dedicated the Appassionata to cellist and his friend, Count Franz Brunswick.
